metadata.dc:author: Jorge Fernandez Monjes, M C
Beatriz Herbel, M T
metadata.dc:description: The results of a method of evaluation of the teaching of a endodontic technique applied on 96 students were studied. It was analyzed the training before, during and after tre teach of the technique was finished. Teachers and students took part in the observation of the results.
metadata.dc:title: Metodo practico para el control de la ensenanza operatoria en endodoncia.
[Practical method for evaluation of clinical teaching in endodontics].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Asociacion Odontologica Argentina
